function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variable and unpredictable airflow patterns in naturally ventilated buildings","Impact":"Reduces the ability to actively manage risk and control infectious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement consistent airflow management strategies and consider alternative ventilation methods","Technologies":"Advanced airflow modeling, air quality sensors, and adaptive ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff in naturally ventilated buildings","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Cross-infection due to the supply of recirculated air in buildings with centralized air-conditioning systems","Impact":"Increases the risk of infectious aerosol transmission within the building","Mitigation":"Install HEPA filters in centralized air-conditioning systems and maintain proper filter size and efficiency","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air purification systems, and regular maintenance protocols","People":"Building occupants and staff in buildings with centralized air-conditioning systems","Owner":"Facility managers and building owners"},{"Description":"Exposure of eyes and skin to UV-C radiation from UVGI lamps","Impact":"Risk of eye and skin damage from UV-C radiation exposure","Mitigation":"Implement proper shielding and safety measures when using UVGI lamps","Technologies":"UV-C shielding devices, safety interlocks, and UV-C intensity monitoring systems","People":"Maintenance staff and technicians using UVGI lamps","Owner":"Facility maintenance departments and building management"}]}
